title: Lazy Days & Self-Care

questions.text: My ideal lazy Sunday with you looks like...
choices: Doing nothing together - couch, snacks, no plans
Parallel relaxing - same room, different activities
A mix of together time and solo recharge
Having some 'me time' before coming back together
Other / It depends

questions.text: When I need to recharge, I find it most helpful to...
choices: Be close to you, even if we're not really talking
Do something relaxing together like watching a show
Have quiet time in separate spaces, then reconnect
Take some solo time to fully reset
Other / It depends

questions.text: For self-care rituals (skincare, baths, reading, etc.), I prefer...
choices: Doing them together - spa night vibes
Side by side but doing our own thing
Having my own routine, but happy to share sometimes
These are my solo rituals
Other / It depends

questions.text: After a really draining day, what I need most is...
choices: Cuddles and connection with you
Your presence nearby while I decompress
A little space first, then coming together
Some alone time before I'm ready to engage
Other / It depends

questions.text: When it comes to taking breaks during busy periods, I hope we...
choices: Find ways to rest together, even if briefly
Check in with each other about how we're doing
Respect when each of us needs space to recharge
Balance time together with individual downtime
Other / It depends

description: Discover how you each recharge and what lazy days look like together.
